{{Infobox dungeon |name = Sky Pillar |image = [[File:Sky Pillar.png|250px]] |caption = An outside view of Sky Pillar. |tokens = 40,000 |location = Southwest of Sootopolis City, North of Route 131. }} '''Sky Pillar''' is a dungeon in [[Hoenn]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 420,000 |- | Boss || 1,200,000 |- | Rayquaza || 1,824,002 |}
===Pokémon===
* Zubat * Sableye * Claydol * Banette * Mawile * Altaria * Rayquaza (boss)
